para.emphasis: Leading-edge projection-based reduced order models (pROMs) for dynamical systems in science and engineering.

detaileddescription.para: You landed on the documentation of the C++ library! If this is a mistake, please go back to the project website.

listitem.para: read the description of packages composing this C++ library;
dig into the test subdirectory of the C++ library.

sect1.title: What if your types are not natively supported in pressio?
sect1.para: Check if your types are supported by lookig at the dependencies: if they are listed there, most likely you are good to go, and you don't need to provide extra information to pressio.
Not supported? You can file an issue to request it and wait on it, or can proceed as in tutorialsB. Or do both!

sect1.title: License and Citation
sect1.para: The full license (BSD-3) is available here.
We are working on publishing this: you can find our arXiv preprint at: https://arxiv.org/abs/2003.07798

sect1.title: Questions?
sect1.para: Find us on Slack: https://pressioteam.slack.com or open an issue on github.
